AT.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
AT.description: Der böse Kaptain K. Rool hat Donkey Kong entführt und fordert DKs sauer verdienten Bananenvorrat als Lösegeld! Doch so leicht gibt sich die Familie Kong nicht geschlagen! In diesem piratigen Nachfolger des Meisterwerks Donkey Kong Country™ steuerst du Diddy oder Dixie Kong durch acht wilde Welten voller lustiger Action über die von Kremlingen besetzte Krokodilinsel. Entdecke neue Geheimnisse, lerne neue Fähigkeiten, triff neue Mitglieder der Familie Kong und steuere neue tierische Helfer wie Squitter die Spinne und Rattly die Klapperschlange. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

CZ.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
CZ.description: Donkey Kong has been kidnapped by the evil Kaptain K. Rool, who is demanding DK's hard-earned banana hoard as a ransom! But there's no way the Kongs are going to give it up that easily! In this pirate-themed sequel to the hit Donkey Kong Country™, guide Diddy or Dixie Kong through eight wild worlds of comical action across the Kremling-infested Crocodile Isle. Discover new secrets, learn new abilities, meet new Kong family members, and take the reins of new animal buddies such as Squitter the Spider and Rattly the Rattlesnake. This is the US version of the game.

BR.name: Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
BR.description: Kaptain K. Rool e os seus Kremlings ferozes sequestraram Donkey Kong e estão mantendo-o como prisioneiro na ilha Crocodile em troca de todas as bananas! Quem irá enfrentar os oceanos para salvar nosso herói peludo? O Diddy Kong e a Dixie Kong estão prontos para sair por aí e mostrar os seus talentos! Cada um dos dois pequenos gorilas tem as suas próprias habilidades, Diddy Kong com as suas piruetas que o fazem correr mais rápido e a Dixie Kong flutuando de lugares altos com a ajuda do giro de helicóptero. Jogue sozinho, com ou contra um amigo em oito mundos empolgantes. Durante a sua aventura, encontre outros membros da família Kong para se divertir ou pedir conselhos amigáveis! Fique de olho aberto para encontrar amigos, colecionáveis e áreas escondidas, pois são de grande ajuda durante as suas aventuras! Todos a bordo? Vamos velejar! Está na hora de derrubar Kaptain K. Rool do seu navio.

AU.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
AU.description: Donkey Kong has been kidnapped by the evil Kaptain K. Rool, who is demanding DK's hard-earned banana hoard as a ransom! But there's no way the Kongs are going to give it up that easily! In this pirate-themed sequel to the hit Donkey Kong Country™, guide Diddy or Dixie Kong through eight wild worlds of comical action across the Kremling-infested Crocodile Isle. Discover new secrets, learn new abilities, meet new Kong family members, and take the reins of new animal buddies such as Squitter the Spider and Rattly the Rattlesnake. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
BG.description: Donkey Kong has been kidnapped by the evil Kaptain K. Rool, who is demanding DK's hard-earned banana hoard as a ransom! But there's no way the Kongs are going to give it up that easily! In this pirate-themed sequel to the hit Donkey Kong Country™, guide Diddy or Dixie Kong through eight wild worlds of comical action across the Kremling-infested Crocodile Isle. Discover new secrets, learn new abilities, meet new Kong family members, and take the reins of new animal buddies such as Squitter the Spider and Rattly the Rattlesnake. This is the US version of the game.

CA.name: Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
CA.description: Kaptain K. Rool and his cutthroat Kremlings have kidnapped Donkey Kong and are holding him ransom at Crocodile Isle for the banana hoard! Who will brave the seas to save our hairy hero? Enter Diddy Kong and Dixie Kong, and they're ready to head out and show their stuff! The two small Kongs are each equipped with their own abilities—Diddy Kong's Cartwheel can sprint him across a distance, while Dixie Kong's Helicopter Spin will let her float from high places. Play solo, against a friend, or together with a friend in eight exciting worlds. During your adventure, meet up with other Kong family members for some fun times or friendly advice. Be on the lookout for animal friends, collectibles, and hidden areas, as they can be very valuable in your adventures! All aboard, and let's set sail! It's time for Kaptain K. Rool to get knocked off his ship.

CH.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
CH.description: Der böse Kaptain K. Rool hat Donkey Kong entführt und fordert DKs sauer verdienten Bananenvorrat als Lösegeld! Doch so leicht gibt sich die Familie Kong nicht geschlagen! In diesem piratigen Nachfolger des Meisterwerks Donkey Kong Country™ steuerst du Diddy oder Dixie Kong durch acht wilde Welten voller lustiger Action über die von Kremlingen besetzte Krokodilinsel. Entdecke neue Geheimnisse, lerne neue Fähigkeiten, triff neue Mitglieder der Familie Kong und steuere neue tierische Helfer wie Squitter die Spinne und Rattly die Klapperschlange. DE.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
DE.description: Der böse Kaptain K. Rool hat Donkey Kong entführt und fordert DKs sauer verdienten Bananenvorrat als Lösegeld! Doch so leicht gibt sich die Familie Kong nicht geschlagen! In diesem piratigen Nachfolger des Meisterwerks Donkey Kong Country™ steuerst du Diddy oder Dixie Kong durch acht wilde Welten voller lustiger Action über die von Kremlingen besetzte Krokodilinsel. Entdecke neue Geheimnisse, lerne neue Fähigkeiten, triff neue Mitglieder der Familie Kong und steuere neue tierische Helfer wie Squitter die Spinne und Rattly die Klapperschlange. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

BE.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2 : Diddy's Kong Quest™
BE.description: Le vil Kapitaine K. Rool a kidnappé Donkey Kong et réclame son précieux stock de bananes contre sa libération ! Mais la famille Kong ne compte pas le lui donner aussi facilement... Les pirates sont à l'honneur dans cette suite du cultissime Donkey Kong Country™ ! Guidez Diddy ou Dixie Kong à travers huit mondes loufoques et périlleux répartis sur l'île du Crocodile infestée de Kremlings. Découvrez de nouveaux secrets, apprenez de nouvelles acrobaties, faites la connaissance d'autres membres de la famille Kong et chevauchez des amis animaux tels que Squitter l'araignée et Rattly le serpent à sonnette. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

Discover new secrets, learn new abilities, meet new Kong family members, and take the reins of new animal buddies such as Squitter the Spider and Rattly the Rattlesnake. This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
MX.description: El Kaptain K. Rool y sus despiadados Kremlings han secuestrado a Donkey Kong y lo mantienen captivo en la isla Cocodrilo esperando por el pago del rescate: la reserva de plátanos. ¿Quién será el valiente que salvará a nuestro héroe? Ahora Diddy Kong y Dixie Kong deberán prepararse para demostrar lo que tienen. Los dos pequeños Kong están equipados con sus propias habilidades, la voltereta de Diddy Kong le permite acelerar a través de largos trechos, mientras que la coleta helicóptero de Dixie Kong le permite sobrevolar lugares altos. Juega individualmente o en modo multijugador cooperativo o competitivo en ocho emocionantes mundos. Durante tu aventura podrás reunirte y divertirte con otros miembros de la familia Kong. Mantente alerta y encuentra animales amigos, objetos coleccionables y etapas escondidas que serán de gran utilidad durante tu aventura. Todos a bordo y listos para partir, ¡es hora de sacar K. Rool de su barco!

GB.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
GB.description: Donkey Kong has been kidnapped by the evil Kaptain K. Rool, who is demanding DK's hard-earned banana hoard as a ransom! But there's no way the Kongs are going to give it up that easily! In this pirate-themed sequel to the hit Donkey Kong Country™, guide Diddy or Dixie Kong through eight wild worlds of comical action across the Kremling-infested Crocodile Isle. Discover new secrets, learn new abilities, meet new Kong family members, and take the reins of new animal buddies such as Squitter the Spider and Rattly the Rattlesnake. MT.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
MT.description: Donkey Kong has been kidnapped by the evil Kaptain K. Rool, who is demanding DK's hard-earned banana hoard as a ransom! But there's no way the Kongs are going to give it up that easily! In this pirate-themed sequel to the hit Donkey Kong Country™, guide Diddy or Dixie Kong through eight wild worlds of comical action across the Kremling-infested Crocodile Isle. Discover new secrets, learn new abilities, meet new Kong family members, and take the reins of new animal buddies such as Squitter the Spider and Rattly the Rattlesnake. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
NL.description: De snode Kaptain K. Rool heeft Donkey Kong ontvoerd en neemt enkel genoegen met DK’s zuurverdiende lading bananen als losgeld! De Kongs zijn niet op hun harige achterhoofd gevallen en zetten de tegenaanval in! Dit vervolg op het succesvolle Donkey Kong Country™ is geheel in piratenstijl. Loods Diddy of Dixie Kong door de acht wervelende werelden die Crocodile Isle rijk is. Elke wereld kent een scheepslading aan Kremlings die je op kolderieke wijze kunt verslaan. Ontdek nieuwe geheimen, leer nieuwe vaardigheden, ontmoet nieuwe leden van de Kong-familie en neem plaats op de rug van nieuwe dierenvriendjes, zoals Squitter de spin en Rattly de ratelslang. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

PL.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
PL.description: Donkey Kong has been kidnapped by the evil Kaptain K. Rool, who is demanding DK's hard-earned banana hoard as a ransom! But there's no way the Kongs are going to give it up that easily! In this pirate-themed sequel to the hit Donkey Kong Country™, guide Diddy or Dixie Kong through eight wild worlds of comical action across the Kremling-infested Crocodile Isle. Discover new secrets, learn new abilities, meet new Kong family members, and take the reins of new animal buddies such as Squitter the Spider and Rattly the Rattlesnake. This is the US version of the game.

IT.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
IT.description: Donkey Kong è stato rapito dal cattivissimo Kapitano K. Rool, che chiede in riscatto la sudata scorta di banane di DK! Ma i Kong non hanno nessuna intenzione di cedergliele così facilmente! In questo sequel piratesco del celebre Donkey Kong Country™, devi esplorare con Diddy o Dixie Kong otto esilaranti mondi ricchi di azione sull'isola dei Coccodrilli, infestata dai Kremling. Scopri nuovi segreti, impara abilità inedite, conosci gli altri membri della famiglia Kong e cavalca nuovi amici animali come Telino il ragno e Boatrix il serpente. Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

ES.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
ES.description: El malvado Kapitán K. Rool ha secuestrado a Donkey Kong y pide como rescate nada más y nada menos que ¡la reserva de plátanos de DK! Pero ninguno de los Kong está dispuesto a darse por vencido tan fácilmente... En esta nueva aventura de piratas llena de acción y diversión, sucesora del mítico Donkey Kong Country™, vas a tener que apañártelas junto a Diddy o Dixie Kong para atravesar los ocho disparatados mundos de la Isla Cocodrilo, infestada de Kremlings. Descubre insólitos secretos, aprende habilidades nunca vistas, conoce a los flamantes miembros de la familia Kong y haz nuevos amigos animales como Squitter, la araña, o Rattly, la serpiente cascabel. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

FI.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
FI.description: Donkey Kong has been kidnapped by the evil Kaptain K. Rool, who is demanding DK's hard-earned banana hoard as a ransom! But there's no way the Kongs are going to give it up that easily! In this pirate-themed sequel to the hit Donkey Kong Country™, guide Diddy or Dixie Kong through eight wild worlds of comical action across the Kremling-infested Crocodile Isle. US.name: Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
US.description: Kaptain K. Rool and his cutthroat Kremlings have kidnapped Donkey Kong and are holding him ransom at Crocodile Isle for the banana hoard! Who will brave the seas to save our hairy hero? Enter Diddy Kong and Dixie Kong, and they're ready to head out and show their stuff! The two small Kongs are each equipped with their own abilities—Diddy Kong's Cartwheel can sprint him across a distance, while Dixie Kong's Helicopter Spin will let her float from high places. Play solo, against a friend, or together with a friend in eight exciting worlds. During your adventure, meet up with other Kong family members for some fun times or friendly advice. Be on the lookout for animal friends, collectibles, and hidden areas, as they can be very valuable in your adventures! All aboard, and let's set sail! It's time for Kaptain K. Rool to get knocked off his ship.

SI.description: Donkey Kong has been kidnapped by the evil Kaptain K. Rool, who is demanding DK's hard-earned banana hoard as a ransom! But there's no way the Kongs are going to give it up that easily! In this pirate-themed sequel to the hit Donkey Kong Country™, guide Diddy or Dixie Kong through eight wild worlds of comical action across the Kremling-infested Crocodile Isle. Discover new secrets, learn new abilities, meet new Kong family members, and take the reins of new animal buddies such as Squitter the Spider and Rattly the Rattlesnake. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
PT.description: O maléfico Kaptain K. Rool sequestrou Donkey Kong e exige como resgate nada mais do que a preciosa reserva de bananas de DK! Mas é claro que o clã dos Kongs não vai ceder assim tão facilmente! Nesta aventura de piratas, sucessora do mítico Donkey Kong Country™, terás de guiar Diddy ou Dixie Kong através de oito mundos repletos de ação e comédia na Ilha Crocodilo que se encontra infestada de Kremlings. Desvenda novos segredos, aprende habilidades nunca antes vistas, conhece novos membros da família Kong e toma as rédeas de novos animais amigos como a aranha Squitter e a cascavel Rattly. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

LV.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
LV.description: Donkey Kong has been kidnapped by the evil Kaptain K. Rool, who is demanding DK's hard-earned banana hoard as a ransom! In this pirate-themed sequel to the hit Donkey Kong Country™, guide Diddy or Dixie Kong through eight wild worlds of comical action across the Kremling-infested Crocodile Isle. SK.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
SK.description: Donkey Kong has been kidnapped by the evil Kaptain K. Rool, who is demanding DK's hard-earned banana hoard as a ransom! But there's no way the Kongs are going to give it up that easily! In this pirate-themed sequel to the hit Donkey Kong Country™, guide Diddy or Dixie Kong through eight wild worlds of comical action across the Kremling-infested Crocodile Isle. Discover new secrets, learn new abilities, meet new Kong family members, and take the reins of new animal buddies such as Squitter the Spider and Rattly the Rattlesnake. This is the US version of the game.

RU.name: Donkey Kong Country™ 2: Diddy's Kong Quest™
RU.description: Злодей К. Роль похитил Донки Конга и требует выкуп — банановые запасы, доставшиеся нашему герою тяжким трудом! Но семейство Конгов просто так не сдается! В этом забавном пиратском сиквеле Donkey Kong Country™ игрокам предстоит пройти восемь диких миров в режиме экшн вместе с Дидди или Дикси Конгом. Ваш путь пролегает через кишащий кремлингами остров Crocodile Isle. Раскройте новые тайны, осваивайте новые умения, знакомьтесь с новыми членами семейства Конгов. Кроме того, вы сможете найти новых друзей, таких как паук Squitter и гремучая змея Rattly, и даже прокатиться на них верхом! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.
